website_summaries.verdict: The perfect kit for the bare beginner. Everything you need to brew two separate batches of craft beer.
pros: Kit includes 11 plastic bottles and two separate craft beer ingredient mixes, which were praised by most owners as very good
cons: You're limited to Mr. Beer ingredient refills
If you take home brewing seriously, you'll quickly outgrow this kit

customer_reviews.title: Fun beer kit
customer_reviews.text: This beer kit comes with so much stuff its great! I got this for my fiancè for Christmas. Yesterday we decided to make it and I was definitely happy. The directions were clear to follow and it was fun to make. It has to sit for 3 weeks to brew but we don't mind. The experience of making it was worth it. (It comes with two breweing extracts so its totally worth the price). All we had to buy was a pitcher, a pot, and 3 gallons of water. Everything else comes in the box
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions exactly. I waited and followed all the steps, for the entire process, which took over a month. I am so disappointed in this product. The entire batch, all the bottles....are totally flat. The carbo tabs did not work. Completely disappointed. I'd really like my money for this purchase refunded.
customer_reviews.author: andrea french

customer_reviews.title: The directions were simple and easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: The kit was a gift and we just made our first batch. The directions were simple and easy to follow. My only and biggest complaint is when we finally were ready to drink the beer, almost half the bottles had lost carbonation and the beer was undrinkable. It appears many of the tops that came with the bottle failed to seal correctly. (And yes, we did them all the same). I will order another round of bottle tops and see if the next batch comes out better.
customer_reviews.author: Bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description
customer_reviews.text: When I read what this included, it says it comes with the Pilsner and the Mexican or American beer. So that makes me believe I'll get a Pilsner and either the Mexican or American. I got the Mexican and American. Funny, those are both only $14 when the Pilsner is $24. The box even has what's included on it and it states it has a Pilsner and Mexican in the box. Not a big deal, just frustrating I have to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Profoundly dissapointed... Looks like I bought it at a garage sale:(
customer_reviews.text: Chances are I received a returned item that wasn't quality checked before shipping it out to another customer. This was supposed to be a gift for a great friend and I am embarrassed to give it to him with everything looking so rough from the box to the items inside. The bottles were mostly all bent, which one would think "no problem! I'll pop them back into place really quick" the very first one I tried to carefully pop back into place has a crease in the bottle. The labels are also missing.. Even after seeing all this I was still trying to find a way to salvage the gift but I just cant talk myself into it.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit is great! It took me years of thinking about it before I finally started home brewing. This was an easy and cheap way to start. The 2 gallon batch size is just right for beginners. I like that I don’t have to drink or find something to do with 5 gallons of beer before I experiment with another batch. Also, own recipies are turning out better than the mr beer extracts, but the equipment is still good. Of note, the seal around the spigot leaked for me on my second batch. Had to sand down the plastic on the keg some, but that allowed it to seal for my next 4 batches and counting.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin and Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Beer brewing made easy.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and so far have made two batches of beer. They both turned out rather well. The key is keeping everything sanitized. Also depending on the style you are brewing try to maintain the temp. the style calls for. I used a cooler with an ice pack and a thermometer. My kit came with a light lager and an Octoberfest. The light lager when finished was a dark amber and had a good flavor(I am not typically a light beer person). The October fest was even better. Mr. Beer also has a website and user forum so if you have questions you can get answers.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Camren

customer_reviews.title: check all pieces
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these. First one, the beer "barrel" leaked but assumed it was from shipping, not manufacture fault. Person didn't tell me until MUCH later so I couldn't do anything. Second one had no bottle caps. So, I don't know maybe I am just unlucky with this product. The person I gifted it to bought replacement caps and is hoping they come in before time to put beer in the bottles. He is, however, excited about this process of beer making and said directions were easy to follow. I think he will make more if this turns out ok, just hate to give a gift and have pieces missing.
customer_reviews.author: L.M.F.

customer_reviews.title: spout broken :( but good product overall
customer_reviews.text: the keg is leaky. All the things came. this was a gift for father's day, But was disapointed to find that the key was leaky even after we followed the directions. all the other matereals were in good shape. We tried to fix the spout by using some poly plastic but that didn't work. I eventualy found some cheese wax. it accualy sealed it! if you have a boken sprout use soft wax. overall, this was a fun proccese to make. P.S you should buy two of those gallon waterbottles. it's cleaner and easyer to use. line one can be filled to the top with one gallon of water. you will get 2 gallons of beer.
customer_reviews.author: samuel

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner setup but not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I used this many years ago and have since sold the kit. However it did do what it advertised, these kits make great tasting homemade beer and thats not a joke. Problem is, this crap is EXPENSIVE! I mean cmon $20-40 for what is equivalent to or less than a 12pk of beer is a complete rip off IMO. Plus you're waiting 30 days per batch and another day or two just to get it cold. Too much squeezing and not enough juice IMO. I'll go down to the store and grab a 12pk and spend $10 and laugh about this monopoly.
customer_reviews.author: Mister J

customer_reviews.title: Poorly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: Mold for spigot was defective. Kept leaking. I made sure it was installed properly but it was still leaking. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: OT

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: This product is plastic and the spigot doesn’t fit properly. It leaks. We tried multiple times to fix the leak but we have realized it’s a defective spigot. Can’t even begin the process of making beer yet because the leak is so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Green

customer_reviews.title: Great beer, clear instructions
customer_reviews.text: Just got to sample the completed beer yesterday! It was great! Light and citrusy, almost like a Blue Moon. We were very pleased with how it turned out, especially because it was our first ever attempt at brewing beer. Hoping to use the materials again with an ingredients kit we accidentally bought (and then realized it didn’t have any materials, just the ingredients, so we bought this full kit). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: the stupid spout leaks
customer_reviews.text: What a friggin joke this product is. Such a pain to clean and do all of the steps needed, after spending hours watching all videos, buying extra things needed as mentioned in their videos and preparing everything, the stupid spout leaks. Save your sanity, buy your beer from the store.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and taste horrible
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is YUCK! All very cheaply made and the taste is NOT pleasant ! I bought this for a Christmas gift for my Husband and he was so thrilled to try this one out seeing how he had great luck with others!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Cook

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to give this a try! Got it for father's day, but it leaked at the spigot. Returned it, and the replacement leaked through the actual container at a seam in the plastic. Wont be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Finndizzle

customer_reviews.title: Great Father's Day Present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Father's day gift for my grandfather, who is an avid beer drinker. It was a great bonding expeirance to make the beer than after it brewed for two weeks, to fill and label the bottles! Once the beer was done carbonating, we both cracked one open and was pleased with the outcome. Careful though, it can be a little strong in smell and a tad sweet. One brew used almost all the supplies we were given but to reorder more is an inexpensive and easy process. Just make sure you order the right set for the right kit!
customer_reviews.author: Neecole Gregory

customer_reviews.title: First Beer Seemed Flat but....
customer_reviews.text: My first batch seemed to turn out a little flat...but I let it set a few more days and gave the beer 24 hours in the fridge before drinking and I am happy with the product. It was fun to make. I had no issues with the kit equipment. Next up, I will try to make some hard cider with my own ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: JAReview

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Easy and Enjoyable Way to Brew a Beer!
customer_reviews.text: Everything was included in the box. Nothing was damaged and the instructions were clear and simple to follow. I maintained my sterile field on all of my instruments and bottles. Made sure to not fill beer to the very top of each bottle and affixed the caps properly. Even tested to ensure no leakage. After the proper time, refrigerated one as a tester. Was pleasantly surprised. Yummy and fun to bring to friends to share. People need to understand that the beer you brew with this kit will not be the greatest beer at the highest standard. But if you want to enjoy brewing and create a beer that tastes good this kit is a solid choice!
customer_reviews.author: cree8tor

customer_reviews.title: the instructions were easy to follow and it only took about an hour ...
customer_reviews.text: we haven't tried the beer yet (it has 3 more weeks left in the brewing process), but all of the equipment came without flaws. we purposely ordered this kit rather than many other options because it really did include everything needed for brewing. the instructions were easy to follow and it only took about an hour to get everything set up and ready for fermentation. we will update this review when we actually get to taste it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gift for my father for Christmas. He was so excited and really enjoyed the idea of making his own beer. He said it was easy to follow the instructions and he successfully made his own beer! Is it the best quality beer in the world? No.. however, my dad fully enjoyed the experience and ownership of making his own beer.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: but worked great. Just don't forget about it while you are ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. He was excited to get the kit and it came with everything that he needed to start brewing his own beer. It did look kind of cheesy, but worked great. Just don't forget about it while you are trying to make beer and make sure you clean it well. I would recommend for those looking to get started in brewing your own beer; especially for those not sure if it is something he/she or their significant other would actually want to invest a ton of time and money in just yet.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good system. The carbo drops are completely unnecessary
customer_reviews.text: Good system. The carbo drops are completely unnecessary. Was able to brew 3 different types of beer in it without the use of carbo drops. Just sugar. If you want an extra boost to alcohol percentage, boil pure clean honey into the wort when in the boiling process. It's a great kit to learn the basics. But don't stop there kiddies. It gets cheaper and more fun to make your own wort! google is your friend!
customer_reviews.author: Reid

customer_reviews.title: Somethings Missing!
customer_reviews.text: I may be new to Beer Making, but I'm not new to Purchasing. I did my research. The kit is advertised as the "Premium Gold Edition" which comes with two (2) refill kits to make two (2) batches of beer. See attached photo. I only received enough for one batch. Where's the other Refill?
customer_reviews.author: A.F

customer_reviews.title: Bad alignment of keg
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer of the keg sucks. The alignment of the two molds is horrible. I bought two different kits. Both I had to sand the worse of the alignment out. Even after a 30 minute test one leaked.
customer_reviews.author: happyhusband

customer_reviews.title: Keg fermenter arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The keg fermenter arrived broken. So not able to make the beer yet. Have to go try and find something with a spout to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: PCO Daddy

customer_reviews.title: No carbonation what so ever!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions to the max. The bottles were not leaking any air as I squeezed them and they were sealed. I waited 15 days to open them and they were all flat! Disgusting. I will not spend money on this product again in hopes this weird method with these carbonation tablets will work again. All flat.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Fun to make!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this home brew kit so much I bought one for my buddy for Christmas! This thing is awesome! It comes with a DVD and the instructions are top notch. The steps are so simple and just being able to make my own beer was very satisfying. This kit comes with everything you need and the instructional DVD makes this thing a no brainer to making your own beer. It is like a science project when it all comes together in the plastic keg. It bubbles and ferments and then it sits and works it's magic. The reward? Taste your creation with a few buddies.:) The shipping was super fast and I highly recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Pat's Fan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and COMPANY!
customer_reviews.text: Bought in December as a gift. Couldn’t use till end of June as a 70 degree temperature was needed. Mr. Beer replaced the leaky keg for free with out a receipt! Works great and Mr. Beer stands by their product and gives personalized one on one attention to any issues! Would never use another company or version!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Comiskey

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and he loved it. He made it immediately. We are just waiting for it to be done. It was easy to make and tastes good. He just bought another refill so he can make more. Worth the money and a good gift for beer lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Amich

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my husband for Christmas and he made a batch of beer right away! Have fun making this beer, but be patient! It takes a while to brew but once we opened a bottle to try, we loved it! The kit came with a Golden Ale beer but you can purchase many types on the website. We're going to try another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: horselover

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have ben wanting one of these for a long time and finally decided to treat myself to one. The instructions are very clear and it was very fun. The Mr.Beer website has additional stuff that you can buy to make it brew faster and increase the alcohol. I love this product and in the long run though it wont save time...it technically saves money on beer!, and it taste great!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Good kit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good kit for the money. Purchasing these items separately would be considerably pricier. Not a fan of the clear beers that come in the kit so I also bought another Irish Stout and an American Lager. After I pitch a Montrachet and two more pounds of sugar to these clear extracts, I'll have 12% pints that could beat you at arm wrestling. Think about that for a minute.....12...%...beer........yep.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Futch

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat Challenging to Get Right
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. Tried a couple of different batches. Somewhat difficult to get the brewing to taste right. Fun concept. Would not recommend for picky beer drinkers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to brew my own beer, I bought the kit with the American Ale and I was really impressed at how easy the kit was. Very good beer. I bought the Amber refill and have to say I like it even better. Just purchased the Oktoberfest. One thing I will say, I bought glass bottles when I purchased the amber ale refill, the beer tastes so much better out of glass than the plastic bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Vogelmeier

customer_reviews.title: winner winner goes well w pizza
customer_reviews.text: Ibought this because of covid 19 and most stores being closed in my town and surrounding areas for someone getting into this for the first time this is by far a reliable kit great flavor and alc. by vol.content love it thank you
customer_reviews.author: Not the sheep

customer_reviews.title: Good guide and introduction into brewing but it doesnt make ...
customer_reviews.text: Good guide and introduction into brewing but it doesnt make the best beer! Only recommend for those who know nothing or havent ever done it. Even if you have some knowledge you are better off buying an actual brewing kit and making from scratch. This should only be used to get yourself warmed up to it and see if home brewing is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great way to try home brewing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a present to myself for something new to try this winter. It's super easy to get started and now I'm on my 5th brew in 2 months. Will have plenty of beer stockpiled for spring and summer get togethers with friends. My wife was originally skeptical of this whole project but she has been very impressed with the quality of the beer I've made and has taken a liking to the Seasonal Winter Ale. I brewed my first batch with nothing more than what comes in this kit and it turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Truth

customer_reviews.title: easy to make beers but definitely takes a couple batches ...
customer_reviews.text: easy to make beers but definitely takes a couple batches to get used to making it. Also FYI when you make it with the wort your kitchen will smell for hours. The quality of beer that comes out isn't to great for the effort and price. After all is said and done per patch which makes about 21-22 beers for a few extra bucks you can buy 2 great quality 12 pack
customer_reviews.author: DonG. MD

customer_reviews.title: Save your money- horrible product.
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions completely. Horrible..flat..tastes like vinegar. Not drinkable. Lengthy time to process- return window closes before you find out the product is no good.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Shatto RN

customer_reviews.title: nice introduction
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this since August. It's a great intro to home brewing. It's cheap enough to where if you find home brewing is not for you, you're not out much money. I've made a few batches, and when I stick to the book they turn out pretty nice. I got a little creative with my October batch and that was fun as well. I think I'm going to try for a more traditional set up in a few months, but I'll keep this handy to make some secondary quick brews. My goal is to stop buying beer from the store (with a couple seasonal exceptions).
customer_reviews.author: bleeeaarrg

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: For my first time I got to brew my own beer! although it was fun to wait for it to brew and to be able to make my own beer it didn’t taste very good. it had floating yeast in the beer and it kind of grossed me out. So that kind of sucked taste wise, it was a fun project to do with my boyfriend.
customer_reviews.author: harmony isaacson

customer_reviews.title: Great way to start a new hobby
customer_reviews.text: I haven't started the brewing process yet but I have set everything up and seems simple enough for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: glitch

customer_reviews.title: Leaky 2 gallon container.
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to follow the instructions when mixing all ingredients, but once I put in the container it started to leak from where you place the valve. I made sure it was properly sealed but it continued to leak. The 2 gallon container has a very poor design. If it wasn't because of that problem I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Baldo Soto

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a gift. He was happy with it - at first. After the beer was nearly finished we discovered there was a leak in the “barrel” near the spout. It made a huge mess and now can’t be reused. This was hugely disappointing for both him and I.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The barrel has cracks in the top near where the lid attaches which became.obvious when cleaning it the first time. Since air kills the fermentation process, this flaw makes the kit unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but the beer was flavorless
customer_reviews.text: This beer kit is very easy to use. We did have to replace the spout because it leaked. The beer we made tasted watery and flavorless. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jonna King

customer_reviews.title: Malt extract cracked
customer_reviews.text: Excited to start but the malt extract was cracked open. I was told to keep everything very sanitary and clean and I don’t know if I feel comfortable using this if it was compromised.
customer_reviews.author: Mankirat Singh

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for dad for a Father’s Day present. Don’t know much about it
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S.

customer_reviews.title: Keg leaks
customer_reviews.text: Upon Forest use, the keg leaked overnight and everything came out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: gave it as a gift
customer_reviews.text: My bother in law was hard to find a present for, so I got him this. He seems to like it, I'm not that into beer
customer_reviews.author: nathaniel hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Not so sure about the beer but customer service rocks
customer_reviews.text: The kit was nice until the spigot broke off when the keg was full and I had a flood of nasty beer to clean up. The company did replace the spigot and even the beer kit that was wasted. They even called me personally after I sent them an email! I'm impressed. I personally can't stand the taste of this beer. It has a strange strong malty taste that doesnt taste like any beer I have ever had. Even after aging quite awhile it's just not drinkable for me. I will try another kit though in the near future to see if a different style is better.
customer_reviews.author: christine v.

customer_reviews.title: very easy and my friends are jealous of our homemade beer
customer_reviews.text: I don't even like beer very much but I needed a quarantine activity and beer making was it. We are on our second batch. It's fun and simple and tastes like beer (I don't even really know much about beer). makes a fun gift, we have too many friends and family requesting beer to keep up!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Neubaum

customer_reviews.title: thank you mr beer for getting me into homebrewing
customer_reviews.text: Mr. beer is not HIGH quality ingredients compared to all grain hombrewing, but if you want to get somebody into the most basic form of homebrewing this is it. I started with a mr. beer kit and after i finished the 3 refills, i jumped into AG brewing in just 2 months after studying and learning while drinking my mr beer beer. I now do AG 5 gallons at a time every month, have my own hop garden, give gifts of homebrew during holidays, and now do more DIY projects because of homebrewing.
customer_reviews.author: Ansewq

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea!
customer_reviews.text: This is my Second set from Mr. Beer. My roommate and I both love making our own beer (especially how quick and easy it is). Great gift for any beer enthusiast that is interested in the process. I was afraid that this product might have problems with leaks but after 6 months of using it there have been no leaks only good beer.
customer_reviews.author: John Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: easy and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy, have had these before. Everything came with it and was a great way to make fool proof beer. ty.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Did not like it
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected everything in it is plastic you do get all the ingredients to make beer but the cheapness of it turn me off of it
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ann

customer_reviews.title: Fun project
customer_reviews.text: Cool gift and fun to make.. Taste, well I'm still deciding if I did not like it...
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brown

customer_reviews.title: ... for my husband for Christmas and he was so happy! He made a batch of stout that is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and he was so happy! He made a batch of stout that is doing it's thing right now and we can't wait to taste it! Easy to follow directions. It did leak a little so we took a nail file and smoothed some rough edges and now it seems good to go!
customer_reviews.author: B. Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dad. He is on his 6th batch. Loves it
customer_reviews.author: Rockclimb36

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor so much fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife as Christmas gift she loved it! Beer turns out better than we think! Just make sure brewing at the recommend temprature
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: What a mess and the keg leaks!!
customer_reviews.text: I need a refund. We did everything properly according to directions and the keg leaked from the bottom. The spout where you pour was on tight but leaked from the bottom of keg through the crease in plastic. It was all over my floors, I used 2 rolls of paper towels to clean it up. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing!! I love making my own beer. It's still not totally from-scratch brewing, but this is easy, and it definitely tastes better than many store-bought beers. You get more for your money, too. And, if you feel like playing around with the alcohol content, you can add more or less sugar as you like. I love my beer kit!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive...
customer_reviews.text: Great for starters, a way bit too pricey for some round plastic. Get some cheap 5 gallon buckets...
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged!
customer_reviews.text: Really upset when I got the package and it was already damaged. I don’t know if the company did it or the delivery guy, either way, I’m not too happy. Overall the design is appealing and this would make a great gift for any beer drinker
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for those who love beer
customer_reviews.text: This gives people the option to create their own beers. I like that this kit comes with EVERYTHING you need to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Lana J.

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: The containers that are included did not seal so it never fermented. The process is insanely difficult and the beer tasted horrible.
customer_reviews.author: ana montoya

customer_reviews.title: Beer
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed ... Not in the product it's self ... More with the receiver ... He said it would take far too long for him to get what he wanted out of it ... Meaning the process would take too long for him ...
customer_reviews.author: Tori Boaz

customer_reviews.title: Feels good after you make your first batch
customer_reviews.text: This kit makes it really simple. And I mean.. REALLY simple. I've made cookies harder then this. Instructions are great and the DVD is helpful to follow along. It's not really the authentic process of what you are expecting (Because they make it simplified for you.). Great to say you've made a batch of your own beer. The pilsner beer it comes with is great. Makes you want to try the real process on your own.
customer_reviews.author: oioi123

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for his birthday. It was simple to use and easy to clean. He has not tasted yet but likes the kit and the bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable, complete and great beer
customer_reviews.text: My first batch was some of the best beer I ever consumed. There are good directions, I read and reread them and referred to them throughout the process. Second batch was a lot easier and faster having some experience. My only complaint is that there are eleven 20 ounce bottles. I'd prefer more, smaller bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Tuna

customer_reviews.title: Great instructions, good gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas present. It included a substantial set of directions (including a DVD), and had all equipment necessary for brewing some basic batches of beer. We haven't been able to taste it yet (still fermenting), but I'm excited to try it! My only caution is that the times indicated for fermenting are definitely the minimum. We have had to let them sit a lot longer than indicated.
customer_reviews.author: happyfeet

customer_reviews.title: beermaking fun
customer_reviews.text: I attended a party where there was homebrew and order this right away. The first batch was drinkable, but weak and sour tasting. I mixed with commercial beer, instead of dumping it. After taking the sanitary practices more seriously, and using making 7 qts instead of 8, the second was better, although a bit cloudy. Now I've ordered the 3-pack with growing confidence. Just have to remember to not move it before bottling, and use a metal (less bacterial contamination) tong for stirring.
customer_reviews.author: R. Yu

customer_reviews.title: Begging into the brew world
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice Kit to get your feet wet with. But I Grew out of it very fast. I did the first brew, then upgraded. I wanted a little bit more hands on, but it gave me a small idea on what I was getting into. If you are looking for a simple way to brew your own, then this is defiantly the way to go. If you are wantin* to have more control over what/how you brew then it will not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Husband didn’t make the best first batch it was a tad bit flat. But the ipa beer was still pretty good and he’s excited to make the next batch.
customer_reviews.author: brittani housman

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, but I was missing the bottle caps.
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving two stars because I got this complete set as a gift a while back and they just now opened it, but there are no bottle caps! If someone could please send me some replacements, I would definitely give 5 stars. It’s a very cool-looking present! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kost

customer_reviews.title: A Hit with my guys
customer_reviews.text: The Brew kit was a gift for 2 of my beer loving sons and was a hit with both of them. #5 has made, bottled and drank his first batch and said it was very good. #4 is in the process and should be ready this weekend. Although it took 4 people to read the small print instructions to him, it is actually a simple process. Now, the order is placed for my husband to celebrate his birthday. I would say this product is a good buy. Refill kits will be ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Jane T.

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife fo rdd Christmas we love it fun to do together and taste great
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy A.

customer_reviews.title: He liked the fact it came with two different kinds of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Valentine gift for my boyfriend and he loves it. He liked the fact it came with two different kinds of beers to make and that it came with the bottles also. He said it was awesome and he couldnt find any like that.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Quibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get to use it. Had to return it as the package we received looked like it had been opened by someone else, not the Amazon box but the actual Mr. Beer box. There was a little rip on the side and the top wasnt even taped. It looks nice and seems easy to use, but the fermenter looked like it was a little flimsy and would crack at any given minute.
customer_reviews.author: FV Abad

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit I purchased as a gift for my husband as a beginner to start off with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Mr. Beer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift. He loves craft beer so I thought this would be fun for him. The directions are very easy to follow. We bottled our beer last tuesday & it will be ready to drink tomorrow! This kit came with two type of beer - good thing as we ruined the first batch by switching two important ingredients. This was our fault, the directions were very clear we were just being careless! The 2nd batch came out perfect! Very fun & easy! I would suggest this for any man in your life who enjoys beer or any hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Suel

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for first timers and anyone who loves beer
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for first timers and anyone who loves beer. The 2 styles they supply are very different and I enjoyed both, also tried a few other varieties that they sell the starter for. It takes some patience to get the finished product but it's worth it. Delicious beer, great carbonation. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stone Saathoff

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Given to all three son-inlaws for Xmas, they loved it. Having a "competition" to see who makes the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a gift and they loved it. I will update once they make the first batch, but it makes a great gift for the beer lover in your life! Nothing inside was broken and while it's all plastic, they quality is there. It's sturdy and I can see them using it for a while. It was packaged nice and would be happy to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C.

customer_reviews.title: Great place to start
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Beer is a great place to start, but I only made the two beers it came with, and I wasn't even done with the first one before I upgraded to a 6.5 Gallon Carboy. Both beers that come with the kit taste exactly the same to me, and everyone that has tried them... I don't like yellow fizzy beer anyway... if it came with a good IPA or Stout, i'd be much more impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Steven B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad for his birthday. It's very easy to use and comes with everything you need. Only thing is the beer came out a little funny tasting, but may have been because of the temperature we were storing it in. He's already bought a few refills, and has enjoyed tweaking the recipes over the last few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came with wrong flavors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a birthday gift and when I pulled it out it included the Czech and Mexican flavored beers instead of the American light and Oktoberfest. It's not the end of the world, but I am a little annoyed and I don't have time to send it back for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and he LOVES it! He has already brewed beer with it! It is simple and the beer tastes great!! He was thrilled to receive it and even more thrilled with the results!! I bought the glass bottles from the Mr Beer website because they are dishwasher safe and look nicer than the plastic ones that come with the kit, but he uses the plastic ones too so it wasn't a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a good first kit to get the hang of brewing but ...
customer_reviews.text: Well...yeah just go with the glass ones and higher quality ingredients. It's a good first kit to get the hang of brewing but the beer itself is laaaame
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Poland

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our S-I-L and he really enjoyed making his beer. We got to try it and it was great!
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my boyfriend for Christmas and he LOVES it. It will be his first time trying to brew his own and everything contained in the kit, including the directions are easy to understand and helpful. He is so excited and has already started. I will definitively be purchasing this again for someone else and recommending it to anyone who asks.
customer_reviews.author: Megan T

customer_reviews.title: Just Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Everything was in kit as described, Very fast delivery. Happy with everything, Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Forever North

customer_reviews.title: It came open
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the premium gold Addition (not used) and it came completely opened no tape closing it the box lid was ajar, so I don't think I got a new unused product. Which i paid for. This is a Christmas gift so I haven't used it if my boyfriend loves it I will change the score. But right now I'm pretty upset because if how excited I was for this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Reyna Carrera

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and easy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and I to try brewing for the first time. Great and easy for first timers. Let the mixture ferment for at least 3 weeks, or longer. The ones that sat longer had more flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: If you want a sample of the brewing process.. This is for you!!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy and simple way to make your home brew... Trying the malts that they sent with it. Down side to the malts are that they are 12 to 18 to get another 2 gallons of beer. So i think next time i make a brew i will be doung it from scratch. But really great product.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip McElyea

customer_reviews.title: This kit makes the brewing process simple and far less messy than traditional methods!
customer_reviews.text: I have brewed in larger carboys, but the ease of the brewing process is a breeze with Mr. Beer 🍺 Just received my second kit. Now I brew back to back. Unfortunately,both kits that I received,some of the plastic bottles were slightly bent from transport. Not enough to affect the integrity,but could use improved shipping method for bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an anniversary present for my husband but can’t even use it because it leaks. No matter how much we tighten it, because of the manufacturing, it’ll leak. Can’t return it because we missed out window.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Only one batch included
customer_reviews.text: Customers say it includes 2 batches but mine just have one!
customer_reviews.author: Krist Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my husband. He led it so much he bought 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Williamson

product_meta.title: Mr. Beer Complete Beer Making 2 Gallon Starter Kit, Premium Gold Edition, Brown
product_meta.description: Style:Complete KitMr Beer’s Premium Gold Edition complete home brewing Kit provides aspiring brewers with our patented brewing equipment and high-quality ingredients that simplify the Homebrewing process Our patented brewing system includes a compact lightweight fermenter that is modeled after the design of professional brewing equipment Eleven 25 oz Reusable and shatterproof bottles that are specially designed for carbonating beer We also Include a can of brewing extract - a concentrated form of all natural malted barley and hops - produced in a state-of-the-art facility by Australia's oldest family owned brewery as well as no-rinse Cleanser and unique carbonation drops to simplify the sanitization and carbonation process
feature_bullets: Best beer Kit for Beginners - Our beer kits are designed for the first-time brewer in mind Step-by-step instructions, simple ingredients and easy to use brewing equipment.
Only Takes 30 Minutes of Your Time to Brew - Using our hopped Malt extract you can brew up a batch of beer in less than 30 minutes.

Includes the Best Ingredients to Get Started - Brewing with Mr. Beer’s Hopped Malt Extracts are perfect for any brewer. It cuts down on time, reduces the risk of contamination, and helps create a more consistent beer every time.

Comes with Everything You Need - Our beer Kit comes with everything you need to brew your first batch of beer. No need for additional large pots, strainers or brewing equipment. All you need is a Mr. Beer Kit, water and common kitchen items to get started.
Ready to Drink in 3-4 Weeks - With our ingredients designed by Coopers Brewery, your beer will be done fermenting in 10-14 days and ready to drink 7-14 days later.
Satisfaction - Mr. Beer is all about simple, and efficient home brewing. If for any reason you are unhappy with your experience contact us so we can make it right for you.
Ingredients Created at A Brewery - Mr. Beer's ingredients are designed and crafted at Coopers Brewery. The same ingredients you are using to brew with, they are using in the brewery for Coopers Beer.
Refills may vary - the refills in your gold kit may be different than what is shown. If you did not get the refills you expected please contact Mr. Beer and we will get you what you need.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,884 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
